ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var objectName = p('salesforce.objects.transaction') var limitValue = attributes.queryParams.limit default "100" var offsetValue = attributes.queryParams.offset default "0" --- "SELECT Id, Transaction_ID__c, Payer__c, Transaction_Type__c, Amount__c, Status__c, Transaction_Date__c FROM $(objectName) ORDER BY Transaction_Date__c DESC LIMIT $(limitValue) OFFSET $(offsetValue)"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, index) -> { Id: item.Id, Transaction_ID__c: item.Transaction_ID__c, Payer__c: item.Payer__c, Transaction_Type__c: item.Transaction_Type__c, Amount__c: item.Amount__c, Status__c: item.Status__c, Transaction_Date__c: item.Transaction_Date__c }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- [{ Transaction_ID__c: payload.Transaction_ID__c, Payer__c: payload.Payer__c, Transaction_Type__c: payload.Transaction_Type__c, Amount__c: payload.Amount__c, Status__c: payload.Status__c, Transaction_Date__c: payload.Transaction_Date__c }]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Created Record
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: #["SELECT Id, Transaction_ID__c, Payer__c, Transaction_Type__c, Amount__c, Status__c, Transaction_Date__c FROM $(p('salesforce.objects.transaction')) WHERE Id = '$(vars.createdId)'"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Id: payload[0].Id, Transaction_ID__c: payload[0].Transaction_ID__c, Payer__c: payload[0].Payer__c, Transaction_Type__c: payload[0].Transaction_Type__c, Amount__c: payload[0].Amount__c, Status__c: payload[0].Status__c, Transaction_Date__c: payload[0].Transaction_Date__c }

logger.doc:name: Log Failure
logger.message: Failed to create transaction in Salesforce

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { error: "CREATION_FAILED", message: payload[0].errors[0].message default "Failed to create record", timestamp: now(), correlationId: vars.correlationId }
